details:
verb
- make sensitive or aware
= example: make sensitive or aware
= synonyms: sensify, sensibilize, sensibilise
- make (a material) sensitive to light, often of a particular colour, by coating it with a photographic emulsion
= example: make (a material) sensitive to light, often of a particular colour, by coating it with a photographic emulsion
- make sensitive to a drug or allergen
= example: make sensitive to a drug or allergen
- cause to sense
